original_text: And they brought forth the he goats for the sin offering before the king and the congregation; and they laid their hands upon them:
korean_text: 이에 속죄제물로 드릴 숫염소들을 왕과 회중 앞으로 끌어오매 그들이 그 위에 안수하고

sentences.original_text: And they brought forth the he goats
before the king and the congregation
and they laid their hands upon them
